author: Redacci√≥n EcoInventos
title: Alelopat√≠a: Una estrategia natural para el control de plagas en la agricultura ecol√≥gica
text:
¬øQu√© es la Alelopat√≠a? Beneficios de la Alelopat√≠a en la agricultura ecol√≥gica ¬øC√≥mo funciona la Alelopat√≠a? Tipos de interacciones Alelop√°ticas Interacciones positivas Interacciones negativas Alelopat√≠a Autot√≥xica Alelopat√≠a Interespec√≠fica Alelopat√≠a Simbi√≥tica Alelopat√≠a por Residuos de Plantas Alelopat√≠a a trav√©s de Exudados de Ra√≠ces Alelopat√≠a Competitiva Alelopat√≠a como Herramienta para la fertilizaci√≥n natural Ejemplos comunes de alelopat√≠a en la agricultura Consideraciones para implementar la Alelopat√≠a Factores a tener en cuenta La alelopat√≠a es una t√©cnica ancestral que aprovecha las interacciones entre diferentes especies de plantas para prevenir plagas y enfermedades en los cultivos de forma natural. Este m√©todo, cada vez m√°s valorado en la agricultura ecol√≥gica, no solo reduce la necesidad de productos qu√≠micos, sino que tambi√©n potencia la calidad de los productos obtenidos, favoreciendo el equilibrio natural del ecosistema agr√≠cola.
¬øQu√© es la Alelopat√≠a? La alelopat√≠a se refiere a la capacidad que tienen algunas plantas de influir en el crecimiento, desarrollo y supervivencia de otras especies a trav√©s de la liberaci√≥n de sustancias bioqu√≠micas. Estas sustancias, conocidas como aleloqu√≠micos , pueden actuar como inhibidores o estimulantes, afectando no solo a otras plantas, sino tambi√©n a microorganismos, insectos y otros organismos del entorno.
Beneficios de la Alelopat√≠a en la agricultura ecol√≥gica En la agricultura ecol√≥gica, la alelopat√≠a se utiliza para fomentar la sostenibilidad de los agroecosistemas. Al combinar distintas especies de plantas que interact√∫an positivamente entre s√≠, se consigue:
Control natural de plagas y enfermedades , reduciendo la dependencia de pesticidas sint√©ticos. Mejora de la fertilidad del suelo al enriquecerlo con nutrientes proporcionados por las plantas. Equilibrio ecol√≥gico , promoviendo una mayor biodiversidad en el entorno agr√≠cola. Reducci√≥n del impacto ambiental , ya que se eliminan o minimizan los productos qu√≠micos perjudiciales para el suelo y los ecosistemas adyacentes. ¬øC√≥mo funciona la Alelopat√≠a? El principio b√°sico de la alelopat√≠a radica en las sustancias bioqu√≠micas que las plantas emiten a trav√©s de sus ra√≠ces, hojas o residuos org√°nicos. Estas sustancias pueden tener diferentes efectos:
Inhibici√≥n de la germinaci√≥n de malas hierbas o plantas competidoras, evitando as√≠ el crecimiento de especies indeseadas. Atracci√≥n de insectos beneficiosos , como depredadores naturales de plagas, que contribuyen a un control biol√≥gico eficaz. Repelencia de plagas o la interrupci√≥n de sus ciclos de vida, evitando que se establezcan en el cultivo. Est√≠mulo del crecimiento de plantas vecinas , mejorando su desarrollo y productividad. Tipos de interacciones Alelop√°ticas
Las interacciones alelop√°ticas pueden ser positivas o negativas . Mientras que algunas plantas emiten compuestos que promueven el crecimiento de otras, otras pueden liberar sustancias que inhiben el desarrollo de especies cercanas. Estas interacciones permiten controlar de manera estrat√©gica qu√© plantas se cultivan juntas para maximizar los beneficios.
Interacciones positivas Un claro ejemplo es la tradicional combinaci√≥n de ma√≠z, frijoles y calabaza (conocida como las ¬´Tres Hermanas¬ª), donde cada planta cumple una funci√≥n: el ma√≠z proporciona un soporte natural para los frijoles trepadores, los frijoles fijan nitr√≥geno en el suelo, y las grandes hojas de la calabaza cubren el suelo, impidiendo la proliferaci√≥n de malas hierbas.
Interacciones negativas En contrapartida, algunas plantas liberan sustancias que pueden inhibir el crecimiento de otras. Un ejemplo es el del nogal negro (Juglans nigra), que produce una sustancia llamada juglona , que inhibe el desarrollo de muchas plantas herb√°ceas a su alrededor. Este fen√≥meno se puede utilizar para controlar malezas en ciertos sistemas agr√≠colas.
La alelopat√≠a se puede clasificar en varios tipos seg√∫n el mecanismo y la interacci√≥n que ocurre entre las plantas y su entorno. A continuaci√≥n te explico los principales tipos de alelopat√≠a :
Alelopat√≠a Autot√≥xica Este tipo se refiere a la inhibici√≥n del crecimiento de individuos de la misma especie por la liberaci√≥n de compuestos qu√≠micos. Es decir, una planta puede liberar sustancias que afectan negativamente a su propia especie, impidiendo la germinaci√≥n o el desarrollo de plantas de la misma variedad. Un ejemplo com√∫n es el arroz (Oryza sativa) , que puede inhibir el crecimiento de sus propias pl√°ntulas si las concentraciones de compuestos qu√≠micos en el suelo son demasiado altas.
Alelopat√≠a Interespec√≠fica Este tipo de alelopat√≠a ocurre entre especies diferentes , donde una planta emite compuestos que afectan el crecimiento o el desarrollo de otra planta. Por ejemplo, el nogal negro (Juglans nigra) libera una sustancia llamada juglona que inhibe el crecimiento de muchas especies de plantas que se encuentran cerca de √©l. Este es uno de los tipos m√°s comunes y √∫tiles en la agricultura ecol√≥gica, ya que permite planificar combinaciones de cultivos para maximizar beneficios y reducir la competencia.
Alelopat√≠a Simbi√≥tica En este tipo de alelopat√≠a, algunas plantas liberan compuestos que benefician a otras plantas o a organismos asociados como hongos micorr√≠zicos o bacterias fijadoras de nitr√≥geno. Estas interacciones mejoran la salud del suelo y el crecimiento de las plantas vecinas. Las leguminosas , por ejemplo, liberan sustancias que promueven el crecimiento de bacterias fijadoras de nitr√≥geno en el suelo, lo que beneficia a las plantas cercanas.
Alelopat√≠a por Residuos de Plantas Este tipo se refiere a la liberaci√≥n de compuestos alelop√°ticos a trav√©s de la descomposici√≥n de residuos vegetales (hojas, ra√≠ces, tallos) que quedan en el suelo. A medida que estos restos se descomponen, liberan sustancias qu√≠micas que pueden inhibir o estimular el crecimiento de otras plantas. Este proceso es especialmente relevante en la rotaci√≥n de cultivos o en sistemas de siembra directa, donde los residuos de cultivos anteriores influyen en los nuevos.
Alelopat√≠a a trav√©s de Exudados de Ra√≠ces Algunas plantas liberan compuestos qu√≠micos directamente desde sus ra√≠ces al suelo. Estos exudados pueden inhibir o estimular la germinaci√≥n y el crecimiento de las plantas vecinas. Este tipo de alelopat√≠a es muy efectivo para evitar la competencia en espacios compartidos. Las ra√≠ces del centeno (Secale cereale) , por ejemplo, liberan compuestos que inhiben el crecimiento de malas hierbas.
Alelopat√≠a Competitiva
En este caso, los compuestos alelop√°ticos se liberan como parte de una estrategia de competencia por recursos como agua, luz o nutrientes. Las plantas liberan estos compuestos para asegurar su acceso a los recursos, mientras inhiben el desarrollo de otras especies cercanas. Esto es frecuente en especies invasoras que intentan colonizar nuevas √°reas.
Alelopat√≠a como Herramienta para la fertilizaci√≥n natural Adem√°s de prevenir plagas y enfermedades, la alelopat√≠a puede mejorar la estructura y fertilidad del suelo. Algunas plantas, como las leguminosas, son capaces de fijar nitr√≥geno atmosf√©rico en el suelo gracias a su relaci√≥n simbi√≥tica con bacterias espec√≠ficas, lo que reduce la necesidad de fertilizantes artificiales. Este proceso es clave en sistemas de rotaci√≥n de cultivos y siembra intercalada.
Ejemplos comunes de alelopat√≠a en la agricultura Tomate (Solanum lycopersicum) y zanahoria (Daucus carota) : El tomate emite compuestos que repelen nematodos, mientras que la zanahoria mejora la estructura del suelo alrededor del sistema radicular del tomate. Albahaca (Ocimum basilicum) y pimiento (Capsicum spp.) : La albahaca ayuda a repeler insectos que atacan al pimiento, como los pulgones, adem√°s de mejorar el sabor de los frutos. Tagetes (Tagetes spp.) y otros cultivos: Las cal√©ndulas son reconocidas por su capacidad de repeler nematodos del suelo, por lo que se suelen plantar entre filas de cultivos susceptibles, como tomates o fresas. Consideraciones para implementar la Alelopat√≠a
La planificaci√≥n es clave para el √©xito de la alelopat√≠a en la agricultura. No todas las combinaciones de plantas son beneficiosas, y algunas especies pueden competir entre s√≠ de forma negativa. Es esencial conocer bien las interacciones entre las plantas que se van a cultivar juntas para garantizar que sus efectos sean complementarios y no contraproducentes.
Factores a tener en cuenta Compatibilidad entre especies : Algunas plantas pueden inhibir el crecimiento de otras, por lo que es importante estudiar las interacciones entre ellas. Condiciones del suelo : Las propiedades qu√≠micas del suelo pueden influir en la efectividad de las sustancias alelop√°ticas. Clima y entorno : El √©xito de la alelopat√≠a puede variar seg√∫n las condiciones clim√°ticas y la presencia de otras especies en el entorno. La alelopat√≠a es una t√©cnica valiosa y sostenible en la agricultura ecol√≥gica que permite reducir el uso de productos qu√≠micos, mejorar la fertilidad del suelo y promover un equilibrio natural en los ecosistemas agr√≠colas. Aunque no es una soluci√≥n universal para todos los problemas agr√≠colas, su correcta implementaci√≥n puede proporcionar grandes beneficios, tanto para los productores como para el medio ambiente y los consumidores.
La clave para aprovechar al m√°ximo sus beneficios radica en el conocimiento profundo de las interacciones entre las diferentes especies vegetales y en una planificaci√≥n adecuada de los cultivos.

author: Staff Writer
title: New Zealand chase down Pakistan to win fourth T20 international
text:
Daryl Mitchell and Glenn Phillips combined to steer New Zealand to a seven-wicket win over Pakistan in the fourth Twenty20 international in Christchurch on Friday and place them on the verge of a series clean sweep.
The Black Caps pair scored unbeaten half-centuries in a 139-run stand as the home side reached 159-3 in the 19th over in response to Pakistan's 158-5.
They were forced to mount a rearguard action after Pakistan captain Shaheen Shah Afridi knocked over New Zealand's top order, reducing them to 3-20 in the third over.
Mitchell scored 72 off 44 balls and Phillips 70 off 52, accelerating over the closing stages to complete victory with 11 balls to spare, having begun their partnership in cautious fashion.
New Zealand can wrap up the series 5-0 in Sunday's final match at the same Hagley Oval venue.
Pakistan paid for their inability to support opening batter Mohammad Rizwan, who crafted an unbeaten 90 off 63 balls to dominate his side's innings.
Rizwan found ways to keep the score ticking over against a disciplined New Zealand attack, led by seamers Matt Henry (2-22) and Lockie Ferguson (2-27).
The 31-year-old threatened to reach his second T20 international century but was denied the strike over the closing stages of an innings that featured a relatively low percentage of boundaries: six fours and two sixes.
Allrounder Mohammad Nawaz was the only other player to surpass 20 runs, whacking pace bowler Adam Milne for three successive sixes in his final over to post 21 off nine balls.
Babar Azam, who scored half-centuries in each of the first three games, fell for 19 when he skied an attempted pull off Milne in the seventh over.
Pace bowler Afridi had Pakistan right in the contest when he knocked over Finn Allen, Tim Seifert and Will Young cheaply and finished with figures of 3-34.
Allen's wicket was particularly cherished following the opener's sensational 137 in game three on Wednesday.
However, Mitchell and Phillips gradually pulled momentum back in New Zealand's favour and Pakistan potentially blew their last chance at victory when Sahibzada Farhan dropped a straightforward chance in the deep offered by Mitchell in the 14th over.

author: Rachel Leishman
title: "This May All Work": Teddi Mellencamp Shares an Extremely Encouraging Update on Her Cancer Battle
text:
The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills star Teddi Mellencamp has been going through a health scare. The reality star announced to fans that she had melanoma that had spread and, at one point, caused her to have tumors on her brain that were causing her ot have debilitating headaches. She's been open with fans through her health journey and now Mellencamp is sharing an exciting bit of news regarding her well-being: Her tumors are shrinking! Mellencamp posted on Instagram letting the public know that her doctors are hopeful and she is seemingly on the path to becoming cancer free.
In the caption on her post, Mellencamp shared a brief update about her cancer and was excited to let fans know that her tumors were shrinking or, in some cases, disappearing completely. "One update I couldn‚Äôt wait to share! All tumors stage 4 (metastasized melanoma in my brain and lungs) shrunk or disappeared so I have 6ish more weeks of immunotherapy and doctors believe I will be healed if everything stays on course. Thank you to everyone who has sent their love, prayers, and positivity."
In the video, Mellencamp shared her excitement. "I just finished with all my scans and my tumors have significantly shrunk, which doctors believe means this all will work. And that I will be back to myself and feeling good. I have two more session of immunotherapy and then hopefully, I am done," Mellencamp said. "And I will be cancer free. I'm going to keep a positive outlook, because that's the way my doctor just spoke to me. He's like 'You did this. You got this.'" She went on to say her doctor said "You got that Mellencamp blood, you're good."
Teddi Mellencamp's Friends Share Their Well Wishes
Mellencamp's friend, and former co-star on The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills, Kyle Richards shared her appreciation and love for Mellencamp, writing "BEST DAY EVER!!!!! So grateful." Richards has been very close with Mellencamp through the years and has gone to visit her friend in the hospital when she had to undergo brain surgery to help with her tumors. Other public figures like podcaster Matt Rogers shared their support for Mellencamp as well. Rogers wrote "Keep going Teddi!"
Mellencamp's Two Ts in a Pod co-host, Tamra Judge, also commented on Mellencamp's video. Writing "I can‚Äôt stop crying tears of joy ‚Ä¶ I love you." You can see Mellencamp on older episodes of The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills.
Your comment has not been saved

title: Terzo asilo nido con i fondi del Pnrr | la nuova struttura ospiter√† almeno 30 bambini
text: Terzo asilo nido con i fondi del Pnrr | la nuova struttura ospiter√† almeno 30 bambini Latinatoday.it | 12 giu 2025 | √∞≈∏‚Äù≈† Ascolta la notizia Il terzo asilo nido a Sabaudia, finanziato con i fondi del PNRR, rappresenta un importante passo avanti per il sostegno alle famiglie e lo sviluppo della comunit√É locale. Con una capacit√É di almeno 30 bambini, questa struttura promette di diventare un punto di riferimento per l√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢infanzia e la crescita dei pi√É¬π piccoli. La realizzazione di questo progetto conclude un ciclo di investimenti strategici, rafforzando il futuro di Sabaudia. Terzo asilo nido con i fondi del Pnrr a Sabaudia. A fare il punto della situazione, dopo l√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢avvio dei lavori per la nuova struttura che sorger√É in via Luigi Tenco, √É¬® la stessa amministrazione comunale: √¢‚Ç¨≈ìSi chiude il cerchio sui progetti finanziati con il Pnrr per l√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢ampliamento dell√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢offerta. üîó Leggi su Latinatoday.it √Ç¬© Latinatoday.it - Terzo asilo nido con i fondi del Pnrr: la nuova struttura ospiter√É almeno 30 bambini In questa notizia si parla di: pnrr - terzo - asilo - nido Asili nido, anche il terzo bando Pnrr √É¬® un flop: dai Comuni richieste solo per met√É dei fondi disponibili - Il terzo bando del PNRR dedicato agli asili nido si rivela un flop: i Comuni hanno richiesto solo met√É dei fondi disponibili. Monteprandone, terzo asilo nido a Centobuchi finanziato con fondi PNRR Vai su X Grandi notizie per Naro: finanziato il nuovo asilo nido con 672.000 euro! Il Comune di Naro √É¬® ufficialmente tra gli enti ammessi a finanziamento nell√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢ambito del PNRR - Missione 4 Istruzione, grazie al terzo avviso pubblico del Ministero dell√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢Istruzione per la cost Vai su Facebook Terzo asilo nido con i fondi del Pnrr : la nuova struttura ospiter√É almeno 30 bambini; Terzo avviso asili nido Pnrr, le graduatorie interventi ammessi a finanziamento; Tre nuovi asili nido grazie al PNRR, partiti i lavori anche in via Tenco.

author: Chainwire
title: Racing into the Future: Polkadot‚Äôs Community-Driven Indy 500 Sponsorship of Conor Daly a First in Sports History
text:
[PRESS RELEASE ‚Äì INDIANAPOLIS, INDIANA, April 11th, 2024]
Polkadot Community Fuels Groundbreaking Sports Sponsorship, Showcasing Blockchain‚Äôs Transformative Potential Marking a historic first in the sports world, the Polkadot community has used an on-chain community vote to select IndyCar racing star Conor Daly as Polkadot Brand Ambassador for the upcoming Indianapolis 500. This sponsorship represents the first time a major athlete‚Äôs sponsorship has been decided by a community vote using blockchain technology.
Daly is one of the most beloved figures in the American professional racing landscape, and is one of just 29 drivers in history to have raced in NASCAR‚Äôs Daytona 500 and the Indianapolis 500 within the same year. Just as popular off the track, the Indiana-native appeared in Season 30 of The Amazing Race and has engaged in a variety of activities that have highlighted his social personality, including hosting the prominent motorsports podcast, Speed Street, as well as appearing in the 2024 NBA Celebrity All-Star Game in his home state.
The proposal to sponsor Daly passed with an overwhelming 95.8% approval, demonstrating the community‚Äôs eagerness to showcase blockchain technology‚Äôs real-world applications and Polkadot‚Äôs vision for a freer, more open web (Web3). Launched in 2020 by Ethereum Co-Founder Gavin Wood, Polkadot is positioned to serve as the powerful, secure core of Web3. Polkadot‚Äôs decentralized governance places the community at the center of decision-making processes; every holder of the Polkadot token (DOT) has a voice towards shaping the platform‚Äôs future direction.
The iconic Indianapolis 500, set to take place on May 26, will serve as the launch pad for a dynamic year-long collaboration. Daly‚Äôs Polkadot Ambassadorship will extend beyond the racetrack and include a series of interactive community events and digital initiatives designed to engage fans and introduce them to Polkadot‚Äôs innovative technology.
‚ÄúThe fact that thousands of individuals in the Polkadot community ‚Äì not a corporate marketing team ‚Äì used their voices to vote and select me as their ambassador is an incredible honor and reflective of the power of what a more free and open internet can look like in the future,‚Äù Conor Daly said. ‚ÄúThe fact that I‚Äôm racing not just for a brand name or logo, but representing developers, investors and regular people that are building tomorrow‚Äôs web, is thrilling and overwhelming. We‚Äôre bringing power back to people, while making sports history.‚Äù
A Historic First in Sports Sponsorship This collaboration represents a significant shift from traditional models of athlete sponsorships, which are typically negotiated behind closed doors. Through decentralized governance, the Polkadot community is pioneering a new, transparent way to engage with sponsorships, showcasing the immense potential of blockchain technology to enable transparent, community-led decision-making in the realm of sports and beyond.
Chris Wade, the Polkadot community member who championed the proposal, remarked, ‚ÄúThis landmark sponsorship proves the transformative power and trust of blockchain technology in making a previously exclusive process open and inclusive. It‚Äôs a testament to Polkadot‚Äôs forward-thinking innovative community, robust network, and progressive governance model. It‚Äôs a blueprint for future collaborations.‚Äù
Join the Polkadot Community To learn more about Polkadot and how you can get involved in future community-driven initiatives, visit polkadot.network or follow Polkadot on X (@Polkadot). Stay tuned for updates on this exciting collaboration and discover how Polkadot is powering the creation of a freer, more open web.
About Polkadot
Polkadot is the powerful, secure core of Web3 for boundary-defying developers. It enables Web3‚Äôs biggest innovators to get their ideas to market fast, with flexible costs and token options. By making blockchain technology secure, composable, flexible, efficient, and cost-effective, Polkadot is powering the movement for a better web. For more information, visit polkadot.network‚Üó
About Conor Daly
Conor Daly is one of the most beloved figures in the American professional racing landscape ‚Äì having competed in the NTT IndyCar Series, NASCAR (Cup Series, Xfinity and Truck Series), GP2 Series and Nitrocross, amongst other pursuits. Just as popular off the track, the Indiana-native appeared in Season 30 of The Amazing Race and has engaged in a variety of activities that have highlighted his social personality, including hosting the prominent motorsports podcast, Speed Street, as well as appearing in the 2024 NBA Celebrity All-Star Game in his home state.
Daly is one of just 29 drivers in history to have raced in the Daytona 500 and the Indianapolis 500 within the same year. With a tenth-place finish in 2019 and a sixth-place finish in 2022, he led most laps, was a pole sitter and finished on the podium at the Indy 500 in 2021. In 2023, he defied all odds to qualify for the NASCAR Cup Series‚Äô Daytona 500, racing on Floyd Mayweather‚Äôs The Money Team (TMT) Racing. He also became the first driver to compete in both NASCAR and IndyCar on back-to-back Texas weekends. The son of Formula One, CART and IMSA driver, Derek Daly, Conor started racing go-karts as a 10-year-old ‚Äì grabbing two championships and Junior Driver of the Year recognition.
Follow his journey at www.ConorDaly.net ‚Äì and on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter and Twitch. Conor is represented by Athelo Group (Sports Management).
Editor‚Äôs Notes
Images Included with this release High-resolution photos of Conor Daly and his Polkadot-branded Indy 500 car entry are available here .

title: Discovering the Divine: Dr. Aldric Marshall‚Äôs Spiritual Masterpieces Illuminate the Path to God | observernewsonline.com
text:
Which force has been mending us through thick and thin all our lives? If you are searching for a guide to feel connected to the path of God, then you need to read books penned by Dr. Aldric Marshall. He, as an author, has crafted transformative books to invite readers to reconnect with the essence of the divine, offering wisdom, inspiration, and guidance for spiritual growth and personal fulfillment in all spheres of life. The collection of his spiritual guiding books are:
"Whispers at the Crossroad: The Silent Power of Pivot" is one of the creations of Dr. Marshall in which he has challenged the conventional notions of success, urging readers to look beyond material possessions and embrace the power of persistence, so that fruitful accomplishments can be gained.
If you are afraid to confront your fears or worries in any way, then "Triumph over Darkness" is penned for readers to help them become courageous in decision-making in life's pivotal moments with determination and belief that nothing can go wrong with the unseen help sent by God.
Yes, history permits one to halt and not repeat mistakes that might eat your fate. In "Unyielding Spirit," Dr. Marshall draws upon the experiences of historical figures to illuminate the path to resilience. In his book, he has involved captivating stories and psychological analysis to help a number of readers overcome adversity.
"Grace Beyond Measure" is composed to make readers realize that the grace of Jesus is with us every time, even when we are not in search of it. Through this book, the author invites readers to go on a deeply personal journey of faith and divine connection.
Reading "Seven Trading Floors of Heaven," you can explore the intersection of emotions and desires sealed within spiritual growth. This book will surely help you with a roadmap for navigating the complexities of the spiritual journey with clarity and purpose. Dr. Marshall's profound teachings in this book are for all readers who desire to explore the depths of their souls with enlightenment.
Finally, in "Hell is Real," Dr. Marshall delves into the theoretical dimensions of hell, challenging readers to contemplate the consequences of their choices and the deeper mysteries of existence. With thought-provoking insights and philosophical inquiry, he invites us to confront our own beliefs and embark on a journey of self-discovery.
About Author:
Dr. Aldric Marshall is a renowned spiritual teacher and author with a background in psychology and theology; Dr. Marshall brings a unique blend of expertise and compassion to his work, inspiring audiences around the world to embrace their divine potential and live with purpose and passion.

author: Dylan Grausz
title: SEC powerhouse has six commits earn high school All-American honors
text:
SEC powerhouse has six commits earn high school All-American honors
The Auburn Tigers are getting some real superstars ahead of the 2025 college football season. With the high school football season now over all around the country, postseason awards from many outlets have been given out, including All-American awards. And the Tigers were well represented this year, with an SEC leading six of their class of 2025 recruits earning MaxPreps High School All-American selections.
Out of the six future Tigers selected, five of them are defensive players and one of them is a running back. Alvin Henderson, a four-star running back out of Elba High School in Alabama, was the one offensive player after ending his high school career as the first 10,000 yard rusher in Alabama state history.
Playing in his first varsity football game as an eighth grader, Henderson became a full time starter as a freshman, where he ran the ball 112 times for 1,115 yards and 24 touchdowns. As a sophomore, he ran for over 2,000 yards while finding the end zone a whopping 47 times. However, it was what Henderson did as a junior and a senior that made him a record setting ball carrier, amassing over 3,500 yards rushing in both years while combining for 122 touchdown runs.
Blake Woodby, a four-star cornerback out of St. Frances Academy in Baltimore is one of two defensive backs from Auburn who earned an All-American nod. Known for his punishing speed, Woodby was the anchor of his school's defense during the final stretch of his career. Receiving offers from schools such as Oregon, Maryland, Penn State, Notre Dame, LSU, Alabama and Georgia among many more, the 5-foot-11, 185 pound corner was named a team captain at the Under Armour All-American game.
Woodby's St. Frances teammate Bryce Deas, a four-star linebacker, also received the prestigious honor. Nicknamed "Juice," Deas captained St. Frances, and along with Woodby, was a major piece to the nationally ranked team. While primarily a linebacker, Deas also was a star running back for St. Frances could very well be the type of player who can contribute on both sides of the ball in college. He received a plethora of offers from schools such as Miami, Georgia Tech, Boston College, Colorado, Penn State, USC, among others.
Earning All-American honors after starring for the Class 7A Alabama state champions, Thompson High School, AnQuon "Newboy" Fegans will bring another talented defensive back to the Tigers' defense. A captain at Thompson, Fegans ended his prep career having recorded 234 total tackles, 22 interceptions and 11 forced fumbles, earning invites to both the Under Armour All-American game and Alabama-Mississippi All-Star game. He is ranked as a top four prospect in Alabama by every major outlet and top six in the nation at his position.
The final two future Tigers to be selected will add big forces to the defensive line. The first defensive lineman to receive the honor was four-star recruit Jourdin Crawford out of Parker High School in Birmingham, Alabama. A two-year all-state selection, Crawford's senior season was especially dominant, as he finished with 84 total tackles, 23.5 tackles for loss and 11 sacks in 15 games played. Overall for this career, Crawford recorded 155 tackles and 38 sacks. As he junior, he recorded 17 sacks which was the best in his region.
Outside linebacker/defensive end, Jared Smith, makes up the final Tiger high school All-American. A dominant force coming off the edge for Thompson High School, Smith finished his senior season with 89 tackles, 22 tackles for loss and 10.5 sacks. An Alabama-Mississippi All-Star Game and an Under Armour All-American Game selection, Smith is a consensus top five rank at his position in the nation.
